wikitext.*:
'''Paula DiSante''' is an American artist who has created numerous [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]-inspired drawings.

Under the pseudonym '''Alex K. Aldridge''' she was also the scriptwriter for the critically-acclaimed fan-film ''[[Born of Hope]]''.
